samples.description: low, ominous hum with a slight vibrato, evoking the feeling of an industrial conveyor belt
crisp, sharp snare drum with a short attack and long sustain
rich, full-bodied cello sound with a warm, dark timbre and slow attack
whispery, gentle flute melody with high pitch and soft, airy texture
deep, rumbling bass guitar note with sub-bass undertones and slow decay
echoey, reverberant saxophone solo with bright, piercing tone and long sustain
lightning-fast hi-hat pattern with rapid-fire clicks and a sharp, crisp sound
soothing, ambient synthesizer pad with warm, fuzzy texture and slow attack
loud, crashing cymbal with a sharp, metallic sound and short decay
warm, rich organ tone with deep, resonant timbre and long sustain
